== User Requirements ==
1.1 Various mobile mass-participant games must be devised.
2.1 A website which enables creation of instances of the games by the users should be implemented. 
2.2 Thorough that website users shall be able to communicate. 
2.3 Users can upload puzzles, maps etc. to enhance game-play experience.
3.1 Familiar assets like Facebook, Google Maps should be integrated to the games
4.1 GPS or mobile data traffic should not be a necessity to participate in the games.
